actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to make war orphans, children of disabled veterans, and spouses, mothers, and children of members of the armed forces missing in action or captured, eligible for preference in civil service competitive appointments.

summary.text: Makes war orphans, children of disabled veterans, and spouses, mothers, and children of members of the armed forces missing in action or captured, eligible for preference in civil service competitive appointments.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to make war orphans, children of disabled veterans, and spouses, mothers, and children of members of the armed forces missing in action or captured, eligible for preference in civil service competitive appointments.
